Player History
Injured on 4/24/1965 with a Broken Cheekbone, out for 6 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Oakland on 2/14/1971 to a 1-year deal worth $400,000 per year...
Drafted in 1st round, 12th overall pick, by Houston in 1972...
Traded from Houston to Cincinnati on 4/1/1972 (Going to HOU: P J. Maloney, 3B T. Perez, 1B L. May. Going to CIN: P J. Denny, P F. Cambria, 1B H. Kato, P R. Corbin, RF T. Armas Sr.)...
Injured on 6/5/1973 with a Tight Knee, out for one week...
Injured on 4/13/1975 with a Inflamed Rib Cage Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 5/10/1975 with a Inflamed Posterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 8/12/1976 with a Torn Anterior Cruciate Ligament, out for full season...
Injured on 4/19/1977 with a Stiff Knee, out for one week...
Injured on 8/7/1977 with a Stiff Knee, out for one week...
Injured on 4/18/1978 with a Bruised Ribs, out for one week...
Had first career hit (double) on 5/13/1978, off Nolan Ryan (HOU)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/18/1978, off Tom Hall (SF)...
Injured on 6/17/1978 with a Dislocated Shoulder, out for 7-8 weeks...
Won Gold Glove Award at Rightfield in 1979...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Atlanta on 5/12/1982...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/11/1982, hitting .636 with 0 HR, 4 RBI...
Injured on 9/11/1982 with a Jammed Finger, out for one week...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/1984, hitting .396 with 3 HR, 24 RBI...
Injured on 10/10/1984 with a Bruised Heel, out for one week...
Injured on 10/2/1985 with a Dislocated Shoulder, out for 2-3 weeks...
Drove in 7 runs against Houston on 6/18/1986...
Drove in 6 runs against St. Louis on 8/29/1986...
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 2/1/1987 to a 3-year deal worth $5,000,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/9/1987, hitting .474 with 4 HR, 10 RBI...
Injured on 7/14/1987 with a Pulled Hamstring Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 8/24/1988 with a Strained Abdominal Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 10/28/1988 with a Blurred Vision Eye, out for 2 weeks...
